author: John Paul Tasker
title: Sophie Grégoire Trudeau 'feeling great' 2 weeks after positive COVID-19 test: PM
description: Prime Minister Justin Trudeau said Saturday his wife is recovering from COVID-19 and is "feeling great" after contracting the virus while on a trip to the United Kingdom.
content:
Prime Minister Justin Trudeau said Saturday his wife, Sophie Grégoire Trudeau, is recovering from COVID-19 and is "feeling great" after contracting the virus while on a trip to the United Kingdom earlier this month.
Trudeau said he and his family plan to sta… [+2027 chars]
